entity.title: Sales Order Item Fact
entity.description: A transaction fact entity with order item grain.

field.name: quantitySize0
field.description: Quantity order. From OrderItem.quantity of ProductDimension.size et 0

field.name: quantitySize2
field.description: Quantity order. From OrderItem.quantity of ProductDimension.size et 2

field.name: quantitySize4
field.description: Quantity order. From OrderItem.quantity of ProductDimension.size et 4

field.name: quantitySize6
field.description: Quantity order. From OrderItem.quantity of ProductDimension.size et 6

field.name: quantitySize8
field.description: Quantity order. From OrderItem.quantity of ProductDimension.size et 8

field.name: quantitySizeF
field.description: Quantity order. From OrderItem.quantity of ProductDimension.size et F

field.name: extGrossAmount
field.description: Extended gross amount: quantity item multiplied by the unit price.

field.name: extGrossCost
field.description: Extended gross cost: quantity item multiplied by the last price.

field.name: extNetAmount
field.description: Extended net amount: gross amount less discounts.

field.name: GS
field.description: Gross Sales: Gross Amount plus Shipping Amount.

field.name: GMP
field.description: Gross Merchandize Profit: Gross Merchandize Sales less Gross Cost.

field.name: GSP
field.description: Gross Shipping Profit: Gross Shipping Sales less Gross Shipping Cost.

field.name: GP
field.description: Gross Profit: Gross Merchandize Profit less Gross Shipping Profit.
